blogs.title: Why I don’t like Ebsco’s visual search interface, part 2 of 2
blogs.summary:
(Go here for part 1)
Because it isn’t any fun.
The old interface, with the circles and the squares, let you zip around and zoom in on an idea and then when that didn’t work, zoom out on the idea and try something new.  I know that for some people, it didn’

wikipedia.title: Educational neuroscience
wikipedia.summary: Educational neuroscience (or Neuroeducation, a component of Mind Brain and Education) is an emerging scientific field that brings together researchers in cognitive neuroscience, developmental cognitive neuroscience, educational psychology, educational tech

facebook.title: How People Learn: Brain, Mind, Experience, and School
facebook.summary:
Free Educational Research books and papers available. They offer more than 5,000 titles in PDF format. All of these PDFs can be downloaded for free by the chapter or the entire book.
This is the one I am currently reading.  Share what you find.
